main event: An observer reported a UFO sighting in Hartsdale, New York on October 4, 1969, describing the object as moving North to South at about 1,100 M.P.H.
interesting points: The sighting was reported as taking place on an extremely clear night,The UFO was described as metallic and tremendous in size,The object was as bright as magnesium ribbon burning,The observer noted that the object was completely silent except for one instance where it ascended quickly,The report indicates conflicting dates regarding the sighting on the provided forms.
witness description: An individual who reported the UFO to the Air Force.
